Class LinearStripesFill

java.lang.Object
  com.a2a.googlechart.LinearStripesFill

public class LinearStripesFill
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a linear stripes fill of the chart.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a linear stripes fill.

Constructor Detail

LinearStripesFill

public LinearStripesFill(java.lang.String fillTarget,
                         int angle)
Creates a linear stripes fill.

Parameters:
fillTarget - The area that will be filled.
angle - specifies the angle of the gradient between 0 (vertical) and 90 (horizontal)
Method Detail

AddColorWidthPair

public void AddColorWidthPair(java.lang.String color,
                              double width)
Adds a color/width pair that describes a linear stripe.

Parameters:
color - RRGGBB format hexadecimal number
width - must be between 0 and 1 where 1 is the full width of the chart
